mapper.insert: insert into room(roomId, title, password, category, hostId, createdTime, personLimit, personCount) values(#{roomId}, #{title}, #{password}, #{category}, #{hostId}, #{createdTime}, #{personLimit}, #{personCount})
mapper.select: select * from room where roomId = #{roomId} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update room set personCount = personCount + 1 where roomId = #{roomId}
update room set personCount = personCount - 1 where roomId = #{roomId}
